title: Sponge cake with coconut meringue topping
ingredients: ['For the cake', '110g butter, softened', '100g caster sugar', '3 egg yolks', '125g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '80ml milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'For the meringus topping', '3 egg whites', '100g caster sugar', '110g desiccated coconut']
